attributes.action: See that Lottery funded organisations who break the rules and engage in political activity be forced to give back the money and MPs who support them for political gain should face prosecution.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Organisations engaging in political activity are not eligible for lottery funding. 

The Government must make sure that the activities of lottery funded organisation are conducted within the law. 

This is an essential requirement for the public's confidence on which the Lottery depends on.

Any organisation that has broke the rules should be forced to pay back the money.

Any MPs who are helping organisations to break the law in order to make political gain should face prosecution.
